content:
i was not the least bit surprised to see that our very own Andrew Hammond snagged a Rhodes Scholarship this year.But that isnt the only good news PERIOD The U of C tied with Stanford to lead all schools with  winners PERIOD This is a big increase from last year when the U of C was shut out.For a school that doesnt really have athletics despite what Tim says or any traditional outlets for our school pride like The Game this is about as good as it gets.That and winning Nobel prizes PERIOD

Your donation will support the student journalists of University of Chicago PERIOD Your contributions go towards our annual website hosting costs and equipment costs PERIOD
